title: Workplace English Oral Communication Skills Enhancement Program Using Contextualized Online Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of English grammar and daily conversational expressions
context.additional_context: Aimed at acquiring work-related English expressions necessary in office/administrative environments, with access to digital learning materials via personal devices.

learning_goals: Perform natural verbal communication for over 3 minutes using 50 core English expressions required for workplace life.
Incorporate peer feedback twice weekly through online formative assessment tools (e.g., voice recording assignments).
Use contextually appropriate language with over 80% accuracy in job-related situations (e.g., video conferences, phone responses).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
